english.segment1: could you let down your hair and be transparent for awhile. just a little while. and see if youre human after all. honesty is a hard attribute to find when we all want to seem like. we've got it all figured out. well let me be the first to say that i dont have a clue. i dont have all the answers. ain't gonna pretend like i do
english.segment2: just trying. to find that way. trying. to find that way the best that i know how
english.segment3: well i havent memorized all of the cute things to say. but im looking on it. maybe our master there has saw a force in me. if i could know the lines off the top of my head. would you believe without fully understand all these things ive read
english.segment4: just trying. to find that way. trying. to find that way. trying. to find that way the best that i know how
english.segment5: well i havent got it all figured out quite yet. even if it takes my whole life to get to where i need to be. and if i should fall to the bottom of the earth. i'll be one step back to you and. trying to find that way. trying to find that way
english.segment6: trying. im trying to find that way. trying to find that way
